  • Class
    Description
    ChatViewController
    Controller that sends chat messages to the GUI
    GameViewController
    controller for the game_view.fxml that defines the responses to the various events in the GUI
    GUI
    main class that dinamically builds and orchestrates the GUI using javafx
    GUIController
    extends the ViewController class, implementing methods to control the GUI
    GuiParts
    enumerates the GUI's parts
    NumPlayersViewController
    controller for the choose_numplayers_view.fxml that defines the responses to the various events
    State
    enumerates the various game's states
    Toast
    shows the error messages on the GUI
    WelcomeViewController
    controller for the welcome_page.fxml that defines the responses to the playButtonPressed event
